title: Akki Roti [Vegan, Gluten-Free]
directions: Similar to baking, mix the dry ingredients first (all except oil, water).
To that add water and mix until they come together. Consistency-soft, yet firm. Like pizza dough without its stretching ability.

Now, take a non-stick griddle, keep it on low heat. Take 2 tablespoons of the mix, Pat it on the pan as thin as you want, increase the heat to medium, add a tsp of oil along the edges and let it cook and then flip and cook the other side as well.
Serve with any dip or chutney of your choice.
ingredients: 1/2 medium sized onion-chopped very very fine
1 tsp green chili ground chili powder- chopped fine
a tsp oil-to sprinkle around fritters
